default.value: Project: AI-powered listing application using Clean Architecture, DDD, TDD. Layers: domain (src/domain), application (src/application), infrastructure (src/infrastructure), presentation (src/presentation). Testing: TDD with 90% coverage. Agents: domain-expert, clean-architecture-specialist, tdd-specialist, ddd-specialist, api-designer, database-architect, security-expert, performance-optimizer. Agent coordination by layer defined in claude-flow.config.json.

Claude-Flow configured for general-purpose development. Supports any project type: web apps, APIs, mobile, desktop, ML, DevOps. Architecture patterns available: Clean Architecture, DDD, TDD. 12 specialized agents ready for any domain.

LankaConnect is a comprehensive Sri Lankan American community platform. Phase 1 (3 months): Events, Forums, Business Directory, Cultural Content. Uses modular monolith with Clean Architecture + DDD + TDD. Tech stack: ASP.NET Core 8, PostgreSQL, Azure services, Next.js, React Native. 12-week development plan with 4-hour Claude Code sessions. Structured with bounded contexts: Identity, Events, Community, Business, Education (Phase 2), Content. CQRS with MediatR, Azure AD B2C auth, comprehensive testing strategy.

Created streamlined action plan for LankaConnect. Local-first development approach using Docker containers (PostgreSQL, Redis, MailHog, Azurite, Seq). No sprints or sessions - work sequentially on each feature. Phase 1 MVP targets before Thanksgiving. All current Phase 1 features retained. Azure migration happens after local development complete. Focus on Docker containers, local JWT auth, comprehensive testing, and production readiness before cloud deployment.

LankaConnect foundation setup completed successfully. Clean Architecture solution created with proper layer separation (Domain, Application, Infrastructure, API). All project references configured correctly. Central package management working. Docker Compose ready for 5 services. Git repository initialized with comprehensive commit. Ready to start TDD development with domain models. Next: Create domain foundation classes (Entity, ValueObject, Result pattern).

Docker development environment fully configured for LankaConnect. Services: PostgreSQL (5432) with schema initialization, Redis (6379) with persistence, MailHog (1025/8025) for email testing, Azurite (10000-10002) for Azure Storage emulation, Seq (5341/8080) for structured logging. Additional: pgAdmin (8081) and Redis Commander (8082) for management. Environment file (.env.docker), setup scripts (PowerShell/Bash), database initialization with schemas and roles, Redis configuration with security. Ready for local development with all services coordinated.
